    Sunway Education Group Vacancies Teacher

    November 11, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Sunway Education Group is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Teacher position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    Sunway International School (SIS) is the first international school in Malaysia to offer Ontario (Canada) Ministry of Education High School Curriculum.  A private co-educational institution, SIS commenced in January 2008.  Due to dynamic growth and expansion, SIS opened up a second campus in Sunway Iskandar, a new development strategically located close to major attractions in Iskandar, Johor Bahru and Singapore.
    Sunway International School (SIS) welcomes interested candidates to submit their resume for the above stated vacancy with the following job specifications:
    • High School Business/ Accounting
    • High School Technology Studies 
    • Middle School Homeroom
    • Middle School Science
    • Middle School French
    Responsibilities
    The Teacher is responsible for providing an educational atmosphere where students have the opportunity to fulfill their potential for intellectual, emotional, physical, spiritual, and psychological growth. The teacher is responsible for developing course outline(s) and implementing instructional programs that will result in students achieving academic success in accordance with the Malaysian Ministry of Education, the Ontario Ministry of Education, and/or International Baccalaureate Diploma Programme’s policies and guidelines. The Teacher will also provide non-academic services to the institution and undertake professional activities, extra-curricular activities, counseling, and marketing activities.  Academic staff members are expected to engage in scholarly activities to develop and enhance his/her teaching, research, and professional expertise relevant to the profession.
    Specific duties required of a Teacher may include:
    • Prepare and deliver classes/learning activities.
    • Consultation with and supervision of students.
    • Mark and assess student’s work, assignments, projects, tests, coursework and examinations.
    • Develop subject teaching materials and learning materials for the subjects and students.
    • Perform extra-curricular activities, including counseling of students, marking of Placement/Readiness assessments and promotion/marketing of the school.
    • Record student attendance for class, extra-curricular activities, invigilation of examinations, etc.
    Requirements
    • Degree / Diploma qualification in Education and/or related disciplines.
    • At least 2 years of teaching experience preferably in International Schools
    • Good communication and interpersonal skills.
    • Fluent in English.
    We thank all applicants for expressing their interest in this vacancy. Please note that only shortlisted applicants will be notified.

    Company Overview

    The Sunway Education Group is one of Malaysia’s premier Group of Education and training institutions providing high standards of quality education. The Group consists of first rate universities, colleges, a professional accounting qualification provider, an international school, a world renowned institute of culinary arts and a training centre offering postgraduate, undergraduate, pre-university, diploma, Canadian secondary school curriculum, professional and other training programmes. The Sunway Education Group is endowed under the Jeffrey Cheah Foundation, a non-profit organisation.
    We are now seeking expressions of interest and applications from suitably qualified, dynamic and self-driven candidates who can effectively contribute to the advancement of our tradition of excellence

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream education sector job in Selangor.
